allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Add Arrangements merch store

- Create merch.html with full product catalog
- T-shirts, motorcycle glasses, signed posters, stickers
- Shopping cart with size selection and quantity controls
- Category filtering and responsive design
- Update main site nav and services to link to merch page

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Add newsletter signup section with Mailchimp integration

- Add newsletter section with email/name form fields
- Integrate Mailchimp JSONP for cross-origin subscription
- Add responsive CSS styling for newsletter box
- Update CSP to allow list-manage.com scripts
- Add Newsletter link to navigation menu
- Remove GrandNight for Singing production card

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Enable The MLC navigation button with subdomain link

- Changed The MLC from coming-soon span to active link
- Links to https://themlc.jasonplusproductions.com

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Enable Interactive Theatre navigation button

- Changed Interactive Theatre from coming-soon to active link
- Links to https://arrangements.jasonplusproductions.com

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
